name: Hypnotic Dream
description:
Release number: 001#
Track number: 5 / 5 
Editions: 50

#
Echoedreaming - Songs From The Dream

This album was recorded in a week, and it is backed by many years of experience with different music and sounds.

In every song guitars have different tunings, scale lengths, setups and even string-calibers.
It contains beautiful femme vocals, a lot of shimmer delays/reverbs and many-many other interesting things.

#

It was important to preserve the simplicity of perception and the complexity of the details.

Different guitar settings and tunings allowed to maximize the features of harmonies and melodies, 
as well as achieve very interesting tone variations. 

A separate topic is the use of effects.
Sometimes it seems that SFXs only emphasize some details, but if you listen more carefully, 
you can understand that they are almost the basis of the whole picture. 
Also, it may works like a sonic portal to the Ethereal World(s) and Dimension(s).

Little noises and crispy sound -- that's what I love almost as much as shimmer.
"Ultraclean sound" kills the true beauty of the Electricity (but everything that must be denoised -- it must be denoised, haha!), so all the necessary noises from the gear have been processed in a special order. 
All needed crispy details are safe for listening, it's spicy but not sharp for the ears.

Music is a physical process, but it's not limited by physical nature. 
We should to remember it when we interact with such categories like 'Dreams","Ether" etc.


-Dmitry Gruber
